curam.util.rules

Class ItemGroupGlobals

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.rules.ItemGroup
      • curam.util.rules.ItemGroupGlobals
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ItemGroupGlobals
extends ItemGroup
    This class contains data items that are accessible to all the eligibility rule sets. It usually acts as a key in the loaders to load the required evidence. These data items are passed into the Rules Engine interface methods rather than loaded using loaders.

    This class is also known as Globals RDO.

    See Also:
    Interrule, Serialized Form
